This email is used when visitors send message from Contact Form on page.

Contact Form allows you to get sales, support and business requests directly to your email from your page visitors.
Enter your explanation or any other helpful text in Description field which is displayed above the contact form.
You can create one or more Topics (Sales, Support, Business Inquires) and separate customers requests by topics: sale questions, support requests and business proposals. Each topic may have own email address.
